Assessments in the Blended Classroom        
Module 1: Face-to-Face and Online Assessments 

Participation Activity: Ranking Pros and cons

In 1.3, you reviewed the pros and cons of online assessments. Now that you have completed this module:

Rank the following "pros," in order of importance to you, by using the dropdowns, with “1” as the most important and “7” as the least important.

Ranking Pros of Digital Assessment


Ranking Cons of Digital Assessment


Rank the following "cons," in order of concern for you, by using the dropdowns. The "con" you're most concerned about will be “1” and the "con" you are least concerned will be “6.”


Thank you for submitting your feedback!
